NK048(tshi)002:1: // nges shes rin po che'i sgron me'i bsdus don pad+ma dkar po bzhugs /
NK048(tshi)002:2: bsam gyis mi khyab mnyam pa nyid kyi sku //
NK048(tshi)002:3: ye shes sems dpa' 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i gar //
NK048(tshi)002:4: 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i zhabs pad la btud de //
NK048(tshi)002:5: nges shes rin chen sgron ma'i bsdus don spel //
NK048(tshi)002:6: de la 'dir stong pa nyid las brtsams pa'i zab
NK048(tshi)002:7: mo shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i gnad nyin mor
NK048(tshi)002:8: byed pa nges shes rin po che'i sgron me 'di
NK048(tshi)002:10: thog mar dge ba klad don /
NK048(tshi)002:11: bar du dge ba gzhung don /
NK048(tshi)002:12: tha mar dge ba mjug don no //
NK048(tshi)002:17: nges shes rin po che'i gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:18: gang yid the tshom gnyis pa la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)002:19: gleng gzhi'i sgo nas mdor bstan /
NK048(tshi)002:20: so sor phye ste rgyas par bshad /
NK048(tshi)002:21: yi rangs shing bsdus te gdams pa ji ltar bstan pa'i don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)002:23: tshad ma gnyis dang bral ba'i skyon /
NK048(tshi)002:24: lam yang dag dang de'i gzugs brnyan gyi khyad par /
NK048(tshi)002:25: yang dag lam dang der zhugs la basngagasa pa /
NK048(tshi)002:26: dri lan tshul gyis bstan tshul bshad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:28: kye ma zab mo'i gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:31: de ltar sems pa'i gnyis pa so sor phye ste
NK048(tshi)002:32: rgyas bshad la dri lan gyi rim pa ltar bdun
NK048(tshi)002:33: las / dri lan dang po lta ba mthar thug
NK048(tshi)002:34: med dgag dang ma yin dgag gang thad bstan pa
NK048(tshi)002:35: las / la gnyis / gzhan lugs brjod cing rang lugs bzhag pa mdor bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:38: dge ldan lta ba gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)002:42: gzhan gyi med dgag ma yin dgag tu 'gyur zhing
NK048(tshi)002:43: tshig dang don gyis gzhan stong la zung 'jug mi
NK048(tshi)002:44: rung bar mdor bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:47: ka ba ka nas gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)002:48: lung rigs khas blangs dang 'gal ba /
NK048(tshi)002:49: zung 'jug mi rung bar bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:51: e ma des gnyis pa spyir na gzhan gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:53: dri lan gnyis pa nyan rang dgra bcom pas chos
NK048(tshi)002:54: kyi bdag med rtogs sam ma rtogs gang 'thad la
NK048(tshi)002:57: des na byams klu dgongs pa gcig tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:59: 'ga' zhig nyan rang gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:60: dpal ldan zla bas ji ltar bstan tshul /
NK048(tshi)002:61: rang lugs klong chen zhabs kyis de ltar bzhed tshul /
NK048(tshi)002:62: de la dogs pa gsal te mthar thug chos kyi bdag med rtogs dgos tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:66: klong chen rab 'byams gsum pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:68: bye brag lugs don legs par bkral te 'khrul ba bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)002:69: de kho na nyid mthong bas theg gcig 'grub tshul
NK048(tshi)002:70: gsungs pa gzhan la mi 'thad cing rang la 'thad
NK048(tshi)002:72: gal te chos gcig gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:75: mthar ni nges par gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:76: des na tshul 'di dri lan gsum pa mnyam bzhag
NK048(tshi)002:77: 'dzin stangs yod med gang 'thad la gnyis ka'ang legs
NK048(tshi)002:78: par phye ste bstan pa la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)002:81: log rtogs blun sgom dang yang dag pa'i sgom gyi khyad par dang /
NK048(tshi)002:82: bsgom pa'i stobs kyis 'dzin stangs kun gzhig dgos tshul lo //
NK048(tshi)002:84: legs par rtogs pa dang log par rtog pa gnyis yod pa mdor bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:87: lta ba'i dngos gzhi gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:88: de ltar mtha' bzhi gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)002:89: dang po'i las can rim gyis pa'i bsgom tshul spyir bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:90: thos bsam lta ba'i lugs kyi bsgom tshul bye brag tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:92: bdag med yang dag par shes pa'i 'dzin stangs dgos tshul /
NK048(tshi)002:93: med 'dzin de yang phyis nam spangs dgos tshul /
NK048(tshi)002:94: dngos gzhi 'dzin stangs kun bral du bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:96: bdag gzhan dngos 'dzin gnyis pa 'dzin stangs des drangs /
NK048(tshi)002:98: dngos gzhi snang srid gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:101: dpyad pas nges shes dri lan bzhi pa dpyad 'jog gang 'thad la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:103: rang lugs so sor phye ste bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:106: theg mchog lta ba gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:108: rim pas bye brag tu bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:109: de la log rtog bsal te lam mchog bsgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:113: dang po dpyad pa gsum pa la lnga /
NK048(tshi)002:114: log rtog bsal te dpyod shes kyi 'dzin stangs kun
NK048(tshi)002:115: dang bral ba'i mnyam bzhag ye shes nyid theg chen
NK048(tshi)002:116: lam gyi dngos gzhi theg pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:117: chen po'ang yin par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:118: tshul des a ti yo ga rgyud kyi mthar thug
NK048(tshi)002:119: dang theg pa'i rtse mor bstan pa de nyid gang
NK048(tshi)002:120: gis gtan la 'beb byed gzhan las mchog tu bstan
NK048(tshi)002:121: pa / mdo rgyud man ngag gi bstan don mthar
NK048(tshi)002:122: thug thams cad 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen por dbye
NK048(tshi)002:123: ba med cing de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas su
NK048(tshi)002:124: pa / bstan pa / ye shes de nyid so
NK048(tshi)002:125: so skye bos rjes mthun pa bsgom du yod tshul
NK048(tshi)002:126: pa / bstan pa / bstan pa'o // dang po /
NK048(tshi)002:127: gal te dpyad pa gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:128: rgyud sde bzhi yi gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:130: rdzogs chen sems sde'i lnga pa /
NK048(tshi)002:131: de la rdzogs chen gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:133: dri lan lnga pa bden pa gnyis las gang gtso la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)002:137: bden pa gnyis las gnyis pa la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)002:138: bden gnyis zung 'jug rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral
NK048(tshi)002:139: ba mdo rgyud man ngag zab lam kun gyi dgongs
NK048(tshi)002:141: tshul de rtogs pa'i gnad las rgyud sde'i dbye ba bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:142: de la log rtog bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)002:146: gnad de je bas gsum pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:147: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin ma dag par 'dod pa'i log rtog bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)002:148: rgyud sde la lta ba'i mtho dman med par 'dod pa'i log rtog bsal ba /
NK048(tshi)002:149: lta ba'i dbang gis theg dgur 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:151: gal te de ltar gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:153: ji lta ji ltar bzhi pa /
NK048(tshi)002:154: des na nang gi dri lan drug pa snang ba
NK048(tshi)002:155: mi gcig par mthong ba'i thun mong gi blta bya
NK048(tshi)002:160: chu gcig 'gro ba gnyis la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:162: dag mnyam dbyer med chen por bye brag tu bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:163: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgo nas don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)002:165: snang stong zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:166: de la tshad ma tshad min mi 'thad pa'i rtsod pa spangs pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:168: des na rang gi lugs gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:169: rang lugs la mngon rjes kyi tshad ma grub cing /
NK048(tshi)002:170: don med ma yin par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:171: gzhan la tshad ma'i rnam bzhag mi 'thad par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:172: de phyir tshad mar bsgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:175: des na chu gcig gsum pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:176: gnas skabs gnyis su bzhag pa /
NK048(tshi)002:177: mthar thug gcig tu bsgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)002:178: de phyir dag pa chen po bsgrub pa thun mong min pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:180: ma dag tshul rol mthong ba'i tha snyad tshad ma /
NK048(tshi)002:181: dag pa'i gzigs pa la brten pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'o //
NK048(tshi)002:184: mthar thug rigs pas gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:185: mthar thug de kho gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:186: de phyir tshad ma'i gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:187: dag mnyam dbyer med chen por bye brag tu bstan pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:188: thun mong gi blta bya snang stong re rer mi rung bar bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:189: zung 'jug dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med du bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:190: dag mnyam chen por grub pa'i tshul dang nges pa'i yon tan no //
NK048(tshi)002:192: de la thun mong gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:193: gzhi gnas tshul snang stong zung 'jug rgya chad phyogs
NK048(tshi)002:194: lhung dang bral ba mthar thug pa gnas snang rnam
NK048(tshi)002:195: kun mthun pa'i dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med du
NK048(tshi)002:196: bstan pa / lam snang tshul dag dang ma dag
NK048(tshi)002:197: par gnas snang mi mthun par sna tshogs su snang
NK048(tshi)002:198: bstan pa / tshul / de ltar ma rtogs pa dang rtogs pa'i skyon yon 'bras bu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:200: don dam du mnyam pa chen por bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)002:201: kun rdzob tu dag pa chen por bsgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)002:202: mthar thug dbyings ye bden pa dbyer med zung 'jug tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:204: des na snang stong gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:205: tshul de goms pa'i gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:206: de la mthar thug gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:209: de ltar snang tshul gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:210: dag mnyam chen por grub pa'i tshul dang nges pa'i yon tan ni /
NK048(tshi)002:211: dag mnyam chen por gsum pa bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan cing don bsdu ba ni /
NK048(tshi)002:212: de phyir rang snang dri lan bdun pa spros bral
NK048(tshi)002:213: dbu ma chen po la khas len yod med gang
NK048(tshi)002:214: 'thad la bzhi / khas len med pa'i lung dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)002:215: khas len yod med so sor phye ba'i klong chen zhabs kyi bzhed pa dgod pa /
NK048(tshi)002:216: der brten khas len yod pa'i phyogs ches cher bsgrub pa'i gzhan lugs dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)002:217: klong chen zhabs kyi rjes su 'brang ste rang lugs rgyas par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:219: spros bral dbu ma gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:221: der brten gangs can bzhi pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:222: rang lugs la so sor phye ste bzhag pa /
NK048(tshi)002:223: de la rtsod pa spang ba /
NK048(tshi)002:224: tshul des mdo sngags kyi lam gnad bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:226: mnyam rjes sam rgyu 'bras kyi dbu ma gnyis su bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:227: des na gnas lugs dbu ma chen po'i ngor khas len med par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:228: snang tshul la tha snyad bden gnyis so sor khas len yod par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:230: des na kun mkhyen gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:231: des na dbu ma gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:232: de ltar gnas lugs gnyis pa la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)002:233: rang la mtshungs pa'i rtsod spang /
NK048(tshi)002:234: gnyis ka stobs mtshungs bden pa'i rtsod spang /
NK048(tshi)002:235: bden pa gnyis su phye ste khas len dang bcas pa bstan pa'i dgos 'bras bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:236: rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma'i khas len de yang don
NK048(tshi)002:237: dam rang lugs su byas nas kun rdzob gzhan ngor
NK048(tshi)002:238: skyel nas lung rigs kyis gnod tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:242: lung las dgag sgrub ji snyed pas bstan tshul gyi sgo nas mi 'gal bar don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)002:244: 'o na khas len gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:245: rnam shes dang ye shes sam mnyam rjes sam gnas
NK048(tshi)002:246: snang gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par phyes te bstan
NK048(tshi)002:247: pas gshis la khas len med pa'i phyir na snang
NK048(tshi)002:248: tshul la yod med kyi khas len gnyis yod kyang
NK048(tshi)002:249: dpyad gzod la sogs pa'i skyon rang la med par
NK048(tshi)002:250: bstan pa / tshul des log rtog gzhan khegs par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:251: rang la bden gnyis khas len nang 'gal gyi skyon med par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:253: nged kyi khyad par gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:254: tshul des sangs rgyas gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:256: gsum pa lung las dgag sgrub ji snyed bstan tshul
NK048(tshi)002:257: gyi sgo nas mi 'gal bar don bsdu ba ni
NK048(tshi)002:258: / mdo dang bstan bcos gnyis pa gnyis ka stobs mtshungs bden pa'i rtsod spang ni /
NK048(tshi)002:259: gnyis ka stobs gsum pa bden pa gnyis su phye
NK048(tshi)002:260: ste khas len dang bcas pa bstan pa'i dgos 'bras
NK048(tshi)002:261: bstan pa ni / rgyu gnyis 'di spang bzhi pa
NK048(tshi)002:262: rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma'i khas len de yang don
NK048(tshi)002:263: dam rang lugs su byas nas kun rdzob gzhan ngor
NK048(tshi)002:264: skyel na lung rigs kyis gnod tshul bstan pa ni
NK048(tshi)002:265: bstan pa ni / / rgyu'am lam gyi gsum pa
NK048(tshi)002:266: tshul des mdo sngags kyi lam gnad bstan pa la
NK048(tshi)002:267: bstan pa ni / / gsum / mdo sngags kyi lam gnad thun mong du spyir bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:268: mdo sngags kyi lam gnad dang lta ba'i khyad par bye brag tu bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:269: tshul des gzhan yang mtshon tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:275: des na dbu ma'i gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:282: gnas lugs la yang gsum pa yi rangs shing bsdus te gdams pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:283: yi rangs shing gus pas bstod cing ngo mtshar chos
NK048(tshi)002:284: kyi sgron me gzhan la gsal bar mdzad par bskul
NK048(tshi)002:286: chos mchog 'dzin cing shong ba'i snod bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)002:287: bsdus te snying po'i gdams dngos so //
NK048(tshi)002:289: de ltar zab mo'i gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)002:290: de skad zer zhing gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:291: a ni ma skyes bzhi pa ji ltar bstan pa'i don bsdu ba ni /
NK048(tshi)002:293: gsum pa tha mar dge ba 'jug don la gsum /
NK048(tshi)002:294: lhag bsam shes rab kyis go phyes /
NK048(tshi)002:295: gzhan phan snying rjes ji ltar brtsams pa'i mdzad byang /
NK048(tshi)002:296: tshul 'dir brten na theg mchog lam bzang rnyed par bstan pas brten par gdams pa'o //
NK048(tshi)002:299: de phyir de bas gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)002:300: bde gshegs chos tshul smras pa /
NK048(tshi)002:301: de ltar shin tu zab cing rtog daka'i gnas //
NK048(tshi)002:302: skyes sbyangs blo dman bdag 'dra'i yul min kyang //
NK048(tshi)002:303: bdag yid gzhung 'dir 'dris shing goms phyir dang //
NK048(tshi)002:304: gzhan gyis bskur phyir phan pa'i sems kyis bris //
NK048(tshi)002:305: de lta na yang dngos bstan tshig gi don //
NK048(tshi)002:306: ji bzhin rtogs pa'i blo nus yod min na //
NK048(tshi)002:307: tshig nus dang ni shugs bstan lta yang ci //
NK048(tshi)002:308: rang mthong byis pa'i thal rtsed kho nar zad //
NK048(tshi)002:309: de phyir zab don gnas 'di don gnyer 'ga' //
NK048(tshi)002:310: srid 'dir mchis gang 'jam dbyangs bla ma nyid //
NK048(tshi)002:311: brten te bsdus don la sogs zab rgyas kyi //
NK048(tshi)002:312: bdud rtsi'i sgo dbye 'gro 'dir snang bar mdzod //
NK048(tshi)002:313: nyes pa gang mchis lha dang bla mar bshags //
NK048(tshi)002:314: legs pa gang mchis bstan 'gror sman gyur cig /
NK048(tshi)002:315: de skad ku su lu pa sa man+ta //
NK048(tshi)002:316: d+harma kirti'i smon pa dza yan tu //
